import {Component, Input, OnInit} from '@angular/core'; import {DataTransferService} from "../../../my-module/components/dashboard/dashboard.component"; @Component({ selector: 'app-coupon', templateUrl: './coupon.component.html', styleUrls: ['./coupon.component.css'] }) export class CouponComponent implements OnInit { @Input() coupons: any; scrollToTop(): void { window.scrollTo(0, 0); } windowScrolled = false; ngOnInit() { window.addEventListener('scroll', () => { this.windowScrolled = window.pageYOffset !== 0; }); } }
